summary: The diff implements a large portion of the requested features including splash screen, login, owner/customer dashboards, booking flow, services management, reviews, profile, theme customization, and chat. However, several specific requirements are only partially or not implemented: the backend uses Motoko only for appointments (not services, reviews, profile, theme, holidays, announcements), passwords are stored in plaintext in localStorage (not hashed in backend), and theme/font counts (50+ each) cannot be verified from the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store user accounts with email, hashed password, and role (owner or customer) in the Motoko backend
missing_requirements.reason: User accounts are stored in localStorage/sessionStorage in plain text (authStore.ts), not in the Motoko backend with hashed passwords. The backend main.mo has no user account storage.

missing_requirements.requirement: Holiday dates, announcements must be persisted in the Motoko backend; booking system blocks holiday dates
missing_requirements.reason: Holidays and announcements are stored in localStorage via localStore.ts, not in the Motoko backend. The backend only handles appointments.

missing_requirements.requirement: Services data must be persisted in the Motoko backend
missing_requirements.reason: Services are stored in localStorage via localStore.ts, not in the Motoko backend which has no service-related functions.

missing_requirements.requirement: At least 50 theme options and 50 font style options must be available; selected theme and font stored in backend and reflected for all users
missing_requirements.reason: Theme settings are stored in localStorage, not in the Motoko backend. No backend functions for storing or retrieving theme are visible in main.mo. The actual count of 50+ themes and fonts cannot be confirmed from the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Reviews must be persisted in the Motoko backend and visible in Owner Dashboard
missing_requirements.reason: Reviews are stored in localStorage via localStore.ts, not in the Motoko backend which has no review-related functions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Business profile information must be persisted in the Motoko backend
missing_requirements.reason: Profile data is stored in localStorage via localStore.ts, not in the Motoko backend which has no profile-related functions.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity / ICP actor authentication layer implemented alongside email/password login
hallucinated_features.reason: The app includes full Internet Identity (ICP/DFINITY) integration via useInternetIdentity.ts and useActor.ts, which is an external authentication system not requested. The build request specifies standard web login only and no external database.

hallucinated_features.description: Access control initialized via a secret admin token from URL parameters (_initializeAccessControlWithSecret / caffeineAdminToken)
hallucinated_features.reason: This undocumented admin token mechanism was not requested in the build request and introduces an authentication pattern not described anywhere in the requirements.
